name: Muvuca - Lost n Crowd
description:
Remember the times we could be in a crowd partying or doing whatever? It feels so close now, doesn't it? Of course, there's still some steps before we can achieve that. But in this game, these people got so carried away with the idea of being in a crowd again that they aren't paying attention to their own belongings. Help everyone by picking up their itens on the floor and bringing them safe to the Lost and Found (Achados e Perdidos) stand. Careful, though, some people are taking advantage of the crowds to steal those itens from you. 

How To Play
WASD or Arrows: Move the character 
Space Bar : Pick-up itens from shining spots / Block NPCs from stealing (Parry System)

Hint: Bringing more items to the stand will yield more bonus score, but at same time will attract more stealers!
